question: As per the Indian State of Forest Report 2017, which of the following is the correct order of states in terms of tree cover?
option1: Arunachal Pradesh> Chhattisgarh> Madhya Pradesh> Maharashtra
option3: Madhya Pradesh> Chhattisgarh> Arunachal Pradesh> Mizoram
option4: Chhattisgarh> Madhya Pradesh> Arunachal Pradesh> Maharashtra
explanation: The highest tree cover is shown by Maharashtra (9831 sq km) followed by Rajasthan (8266 sq km), Madhya Pradesh (8073 sq km) and Gujarat (8024 sq km).
